questions.text: The golden age of the Khmer empire is associated with what capital city?
Who was the founder of the Khmer empire?
The early Khmers were influenced by which Hindu cult in which divine power was embodied in a god-king?
Which Khmer king initiated the series of reservoirs and canals which allowed the empire to grow substantially in the late 9th-early 10th centuries?
Most of what we know about the Khmer empire has been left inscribed in which language?
The Khmer kings erected temple-tombs for themselves that duplicated which mountain of Hindu myth?
Which Khmer emperor built Angkor Wat?
The Khmer empire occupied all or parts of all but which of the following countries?
In 1444, the Khmer empire succumbed to an invasion by which group?
questions.explanation:
Thai.

	Ayutthaya is the name of the Thai kingdom.
